verses.verse: Now Joseph <WH3130> had been taken <WH3381> down <WH3381> to Egypt; <WH4714> and Potiphar, <WH6318> an Egyptian <WH4713> officer <WH5631> of Pharaoh, <WH6547> the captain <WH8269> of the bodyguard, <WH2876> bought <WH7069> him from the Ishmaelites, <WH3459> who <WH834> had taken <WH3381> him down <WH3381> there. <WH8033>
And the Lord <WH3068> was with Joseph, <WH3130> so he became <WH1961> a successful <WH6743> man. <WH376> And he was in the house <WH1004> of his master, <WH113> the Egyptian. <WH4713>
Now his master <WH113> saw <WH7200> that the Lord <WH3068> was with him and [how] the Lord <WH3068> caused all <WH3605> that he did <WH6213> to prosper <WH6743> in his hand. <WH3027>

So Joseph <WH3130> found <WH4672> favor <WH2580> in his sight, <WH5869> and became <WH8334> his personal <WH8334> servant; <WH8334> and he made <WH6485> him overseer <WH6485> over <WH5921> his house, <WH1004> and all <WH3605> that he owned <WH3426> he put <WH5414> in his charge. <WH3027>

And it came <WH1961> about that from the time <WH227> he made <WH6485> him overseer <WH6485> in his house, <WH1004> and over <WH5921> all <WH3605> that he owned, <WH3426> the Lord <WH3068> blessed <WH1288> the Egyptian's house <WH1004> on account <WH1558> of Joseph; <WH3130> thus the Lord's blessing <WH1293> was upon all <WH3605> that he owned, <WH3426> in the house <WH1004> and in the field. <WH7704>

So he left <WH5800> everything <WH3605> he owned in Joseph <WH3130>'s charge; <WH3027> and with him [there] he did not concern <WH3045> himself with anything <WH3972> except <WH3588> <WH518> the food <WH3899> which <WH834> he ate. <WH398> Now Joseph was handsome <WH3303> in form <WH8389> and appearance. <WH4758>

And it came <WH1961> about after <WH310> these <WH428> events <WH1697> that his master's wife <WH802> looked <WH5375> <WH5869> with desire <WH5375> at Joseph, <WH3130> and she said, <WH559> "Lie <WH7901> with me."

But he refused <WH3985> and said <WH559> to his master <WH113>'s wife, <WH802> "Behold, <WH2005> with me [here,] my master does not concern <WH3045> himself with anything <WH4100> in the house, <WH1004> and he has put <WH5414> all <WH3605> that he owns <WH3426> in my charge. <WH3027>

"There <WH369> is no <WH369> one greater <WH1419> in this <WH2088> house <WH1004> than <WH4480> I, and he has withheld <WH2820> nothing <WH3808> <WH3972> from me except <WH3588> <WH518> you, because <WH834> you are his wife. <WH802> How <WH349> then could I do <WH6213> this <WH2088> great <WH1419> evil, <WH9567> and sin <WH2398> against God <WH430>?"
And it came <WH1961> about as she spoke <WH1696> to Joseph <WH3130> day <WH3117> after day, <WH3117> that he did not listen <WH8085> to her to lie <WH7901> beside <WH681> her, [or] be with her.

Now it happened <WH1961> one <WH2088> day <WH3117> that he went <WH935> into the house <WH1004> to do <WH6213> his work, <WH4399> and none <WH369> <WH376> of the men <WH376> of the household <WH1004> was there <WH8033> inside. <WH1004>

And she caught <WH8610> him by his garment, <WH899> saying, <WH559> "Lie <WH7901> with me!" And he left <WH5800> his garment <WH899> in her hand <WH3027> and fled, <WH5127> and went <WH3318> outside. <WH2351>
When she saw <WH7200> that he had left <WH5800> his garment <WH899> in her hand, <WH3027> and had fled <WH5127> outside, <WH2351>

she called <WH7121> to the men <WH376> of her household, <WH1004> and said <WH559> to them, "See, <WH7200> he has brought <WH935> in a Hebrew <WH5680> to us to make <WH6711> sport <WH6711> of us; he came <WH935> in to me to lie <WH7901> with me, and I screamed <WH7121>. <WH6963> <WH1419>

"And it came <WH1961> about when he heard <WH8085> that I raised <WH7311> my voice <WH6963> and screamed, <WH7121> that he left <WH5800> his garment <WH899> beside <WH681> me and fled, <WH5127> and went <WH3318> outside. <WH2351>"
So she left <WH5117> his garment <WH899> beside <WH681> her until <WH5704> his master <WH113> came <WH935> home. <WH1004>

Then she spoke <WH1696> to him with these <WH428> words, <WH1697> "The Hebrew <WH5680> slave, <WH5650> whom <WH834> you brought <WH935> to us, came <WH935> in to me to make <WH6711> sport <WH6711> of me;
and it happened <WH1961> as I raised <WH7311> my voice <WH6963> and screamed, <WH7121> that he left <WH5800> his garment <WH899> beside <WH681> me and fled <WH5127> outside. <WH2351> "

Now it came <WH1961> about when his master <WH113> heard <WH8085> the words <WH1697> of his wife, <WH802> which <WH834> she spoke <WH1696> to him, saying, <WH559> "This <WH1697> <WH428> is what <WH1697> your slave <WH5650> did <WH6213> to me," that his anger <WH639> burned. <WH2734>

So Joseph's master <WH113> took <WH3947> him and put <WH5414> him into the jail, <WH1004> <WH5470> the place <WH4725> where <WH834> the king's prisoners <WH615> were confined; <WH631> and he was there <WH8033> in the jail. <WH1004> <WH5470>

But the Lord <WH3068> was with Joseph <WH3130> and extended <WH5186> kindness <WH2617> to him, and gave <WH5414> him favor <WH2580> in the sight <WH5869> of the chief <WH8269> jailer. <WH1004> <WH5470>

And the chief <WH8269> jailer <WH1004> <WH5470> committed <WH5414> to Joseph's charge <WH3027> all <WH3605> the prisoners <WH615> who <WH834> were in the jail <WH1004>; <WH5470> so that whatever <WH3605> <WH834> was done <WH6213> there, <WH8033> he was responsible <WH6213> [for it.]

The chief <WH8269> jailer <WH1004> <WH5470> did not supervise <WH7200> anything <WH3605> <WH3972> under Joseph's charge <WH3027> because <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> was with him; and whatever <WH834> he did, <WH6213> the Lord <WH3068> made to prosper. <WH6743>
